Text: is it standalone or do you need the original game?

The expansion is only 14.75 MB if downloaded through GamersGate (Paradox' own distribution service).
The demo, which is standalone but does not allow savegames and is otherwise very limited as well, but is standalone, is only 266 MB.
So what this would be at 183.56 MB, would be weird.
Remember to check for viruses and other potentially unwanted software using services like virustotal.com or virusscan.jotti.org for example.
